traits.name: Cunning of Kong
traits.desc: The heir has advantage on saving throws against illusions and enchantments.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The heir makes two fist attacks.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Psychic Blast (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The heir emits a violent wave of psychic energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 12 Intelligence saving throw or take 7 (2d6) psychic damage and become stunned until the end of the heir's next turn.
